name: What would you do? (itch)
description:
Hello there players.

This is a short narrative game I made in a week. 

In this game, you play as a father who lost his daughter during the war. He thought that this war was caused by a group of occult people so, he killed them to try to bring his daughter back to life. As he realized that it failed and that nothing could bring her back, he decided to live far away from human civilization. During his journey, he will meet a very...Mysterious man. What does this man know about our protagonist?

Find it out by playing this short narrative game! 

I hope you will enjoy it!

Note: to quit the game, click Alt+4 (after the credits, the game will close automatically)

The save feature does not work!

Press esc to skip the text .
